sequenceDiagram autonumber actor U as User / Notebook participant C as Crew participant A as Agent participant L as AnthropicPromptCachingLLM participant API as Anthropic Messages API participant Cache as Anthropic Prompt Cache Note over U: Run the notebook to demo caching U->>C: kickoff(CloudNative_Serverless) C->>A: execute Task A->>L: call(CloudNative_DockerImage) Note right of L: Build payload Note right of L: - model, messages, temperature, max_tokens Note right of L: - system = [CloudNative_HelmChart] Note right of L: - last system block gets
cache_control: {CloudNative_ServiceMesh} Note right of L: - headers: anthropopic-version (CloudNative_HelmChart) alt First run (CloudNative_K8sCluster) L->>API: POST /v1/messages (CloudNative_HelmChart) API->>Cache: Write cached system blocks API-->>L: response + usage{CloudNative_ServiceMesh} else Subsequent run within TTL (CloudNative_DockerImage) L->>API: POST /v1/messages (CloudNative_ServiceMesh) API->>Cache: Read cached system blocks API-->>L: response + usage{CloudNative_K8sCluster} end L-->>A: assistant text A-->>C: task result C-->>U: result + timing Note over Cache: TTL options Note over Cache: - 5m (CloudNative_HelmChart) Note over Cache: - 1h (CloudNative_ServiceMesh) Note over L,API: Cache hit requires: Note over L,API: - Identical system content Note over L,API: - Same model + headers Note over L,API: - Within TTL window.
